titleStmt.title: All vain janglers, imitatours and licentious persons, shut out of the Scriptures who are not guided by the same spirit that gave them forth. The old serpents voice, or Antichrist discovered opposing Christ in his kingdome. By one who desires the redemption of souls out of Sathans wiles, James Nayler.
titleStmt.author: Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.

notesStmt.note: In this edition the first line of title ends: shut out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
